content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 9, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 37, "index": 32}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 35}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a lime_terracotta, I need to craft a lime_dye first. Lime dye can be crafted using a sea pickle. Therefore I will smelt the sea pickle at slot 16 to craft the lime dye.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 16 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 9, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 37, "index": 32}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 35}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}]

thought: Now I have crafted the lime dye, I can begin crafting the lime terracotta. This involves crafting a 3x3 grid of terracotta with the lime dye in the middle. Therefore I will move one of the terracotta blocks from slot 33 into the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 9, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 37, "index": 32}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 35}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}]

Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 2 with quantity 1
